name: Toy Studio By Emma Jr
description:
Welcome to Toy Studio, the world of little cute toys and you. Your imagination and creativeness is unlimited and you can decorate toys for fabulous events based on your customer requirements.
The real journey started when a little girl Emma Jr wanted to start her own Toy Studio and she got a big helping hand from Emma Sr. Emma Sr helped Emma Jr to start the Toy Studio.
We requested Emma Sr to help the people who are in need of assistance in setting up their own Toy Studios on mobiles and tablets. Well.. Emma Sr is so generous and expressed her willingness to support the people to setup their toy studio. Thanks .. Emma Sr kudos. Emma Sr will be your helping assistant to build the salon for you.
Now its time to Play and Build your own Toy Studio:
1. With the help of Emma Sr, pick up your first order
2. Decorate toys with cute dresses and accessories according to the need shown in preview picture
3. Collect stars and coins for each order execution
4. Complete many orders as possible to accumulate stars and coins
Here are the lists of Fabulous features of Toy Studio:
1. Supported in 15+ languages. Start your Salon in your own language
2. Infinite game play with hundreds of decoration elements that includes Wide range of toys
3. Excellent quality HD graphics and fully optimised to match native look and feel, performance
4. Beautiful and soothing music to relax your mind
5. Basic internet connection will do as there is less amount of data travels from server to mobile and viceversa
6. No need to look for updates, when there is an update app automatically find out and informs you
Wow… What are you waiting for? Go ahead Serve customers, earn money, and make your customers more happy
